## assertIncludes() function

Assert that a string is included in another, or object is included in an array.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function assertIncludes(haystack: string | any[], needle: any, message?: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  haystack | string \| any\[\] | The thing to search in. |
|  needle | any | The thing to search for. |
|  message | string | Optional error message if the assertion does not hold. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Example


```javascript
assertIncludes('foobar', 'foo');
assertIncludes([9, 5, 3], 5);

```
